text: Aarhus Aalborg Herning Viborg == Quarter-finals == Key to colours in group tables Team advanced to the Semi-Finals Team was not able to advance to the Semi-Finals Belarus, Iceland and Denmark played on a three-way tie to find the one team who will qualify. Belarus won, and they qualified. 23 June 2011 align=right align=right 29 June 2011 align=right align=right == Knockout round road to Denmark 2011 Championship == Category:2011 in association football Category:2011 in Europe Category:2010s in Danish sport Category:Football competitions in Europe Category:UEFA Category:Football in Denmark
title: 2011 UEFA European Under-21 Football Championship
